rows.label: tlk43420171_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Sure is a good thing my Blade's
so powerful!

rows.label: tlk43420171_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The other day my Blade found a poor
sod who'd fallen onto Acedia's back.

rows.label: tlk43420171_02_msg0003
rows.name:
She was from the refugee camp,
said she didn't want any help from
a Blade. Got quite angry...

rows.label: tlk43420171_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But we couldn't just leave her there
like that, so we had to manhandle
her out of there!
